input.title: Field value
input.description: The input value to validate. (supports EL)

isRequired.title: Required
isRequired.description: If true, check the pattern always. If false check the pattern, only if this one is present in the request.

type.title: Type
type.description: The constraint rule to apply to the field value.

titleMap.MIN: MIN: Field number value is greater or equals than parameter
titleMap.MAX: MAX: Field number value is lower or equals than parameter
titleMap.MAIL: MAIL: Field value is a valid email
titleMap.PATTERN: PATTERN: Field value is valid according to the pattern parameter
titleMap.DATE: DATE: Field value is valid according to the date format parameter
titleMap.SIZE: Field value length is between min and max parameters
titleMap.ENUM: ENUM: Field value included in ENUM

banner.title: Type
banner.text:
The constraint rule to apply to the field value.
  • NOT_NULL: Field value is required
  • MIN: Field number value is greater or equals than parameter
  • MAX: Field number value is lower or equals than parameter
  • MAIL: Field value is a valid email
  • PATTERN: Field value is valid according to the pattern parameter
  • DATE: Field value is valid according to the date format parameter
  • SIZE: Field value length is between min and max parameters
  • ENUM: Field value included in ENUM

items.title: Parameter
items.description: Must be defined for MIN, MAX, DATE or PATTERN constraints. (supports EL)

message.title: Message template
message.description: Set a message template to override the default one. (Example: '%s' must be higher or equals to '%s')
